acceptance.content1: Welcome to DetectivesGame ("we," "our," or "us"). These Terms of Service ("Terms") govern your use of our interactive detective gaming platform, including our website, mobile applications, and all related services (collectively, the "Service"). By accessing or using our Service, you agree to be bound by these Terms.
acceptance.content2: If you do not agree to these Terms, please do not use our Service. We may update these Terms from time to time, and your continued use of the Service constitutes acceptance of any changes.

description.title: 2. Description of Service
description.intro: DetectivesGame is an interactive gaming platform that provides immersive mystery and detective experiences. Our Service includes:

items.cases: Interactive Detective Cases: Solve crimes, analyze evidence, interrogate suspects, and uncover mysteries
items.generator: Case Generation Tools: Create custom detective scenarios and cases
items.forensics: Forensic Analysis: Access virtual autopsy reports, evidence analysis, and crime scene investigations
items.vacation: Vacation Rental Mystery Experiences: Specialized cases designed for hospitality venues
items.venue: Venue Management: Tools for businesses to integrate mystery games into their services
items.social: Social Features: Email systems, notifications, and collaborative gameplay
items.premium: Premium Subscriptions: Enhanced features and exclusive content
items.qr: QR Code Integration: Interactive physical-digital gaming experiences

items.notify: Notify us immediately of any unauthorized use of your account

accounts.age: You must be at least 13 years old to create an account. Users under 18 must have parental consent to use our Service.
